title: Virtual Simulation Education to Prevent Unplanned Extubation in Adult ICU Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing skills and understanding of intensive care unit (ICU) environments
context.additional_context: Learners, possessing intermediate-level knowledge of ICU nursing as general citizens, experience real clinical scenarios through branch-scenario-based virtual simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can identify unplanned extubation risk factors in five branching scenarios with 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply extubation prevention strategies (e.g., tube fixation, patient monitoring) in a simulation environment with 90% compliance.
Learners can develop extubation prevention educational materials and integrate them into nursing practice through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
